Title: Heatwave
Plot: Tom decides to throw a last minute pool party during a heatwave without consulting Trina first, who is still mad at her husband for his recent affair. Susan lends an ear when Roger loses his job and Bruce gets closer to his co-worker, Melinda.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Katie Lowes, Heidi Marnhout, Tony Daly, Elizabeth Ruscio
